translation.en: [narrator] Past the place that you come from,
is a town like your town
if your town was a dream.
Only it's not a dream or a hoax or a ruse.
translation.ko: 그러나 꿈도 환상도 아닌 진짜 마을이...

translation.en: [narrator] It is Christmas in Who-ville, the home of the Whos.
translation.ko: 이 마을 후빌에도 어느덧 크리스마스가 왔어요

translation.en: Fresh peppermint bread. Oh, hey, Marge.
-Here you go, kid, have a wreath. -Oh, cool!
-Have a great day, dear. -You too, hon. See you tonight!
translation.ko: 잘 다녀와, 여보 당신도! 저녁에 봐

translation.en: [narrator] Yes, Who-ville is great, that is known far and wide
translation.ko: 네, 후빌은 멋진 마을이에요 그건 온 세상이 다 알죠

translation.en: and three weeks through December, this place hits its stride.
[narrator] Yes, the Whos down in Who-ville liked Christmas a lot.
translation.ko: 네, 후빌의 주민 '후'들은 크리스마스를 정말 좋아했어요

translation.en: But the Grinch, in his cave north of Who-ville,
translation.ko: 하지만 후빌 북쪽 동굴에 사는 그린치는

translation.en: ♪ On the second day of Christmas My true love sent to me ♪ Max!
♪ You gonna spoil everybody With your bad attitude ♪
Max, what is this depressing bean?
translation.ko: 맥스 왜 딸랑 콩 한 쪽이야?

translation.en: That's impossible. We can't be out of food.
translation.ko: 말도 안 돼 먹을 게 왜 없어?

translation.en: Where's my personal reserve of moose juice? And goose juice?
translation.ko: 나만 먹으려고 남겨둔 지렁이 주스와 우렁이 주스는?

translation.en: My emergency stash of Who Hash?
And my secret slew of frozen Beezle-Nut stew?
I specifically bought enough food to last until January.
How much emotional eating have I been doing?
No, I won't. I will not. I am not going to Who-ville during...
translation.ko: 싫어, 안 가 후빌엔 안 간다고, 크...

translation.en: But I'm gonna despise every second of it.
No one quite knows the reason.
It could be his head -wasn't screwed on just right. -[neck cracks]
It could be, perhaps, -that his shoes were too tight. -[grunts]
translation.ko: 신발 끈이 너무 꽉 조여서 그럴 수도 있죠

translation.en: But I think the most likely reason of all
may have been that his heart was two sizes too small.
translation.ko: 남들의 1/3 크기밖에 안 돼서 그런 거 같아요

translation.en: this is the time of year when the Whos are at their most deceptive.
to attack anyone who so much as says one kind word to us.
translation.ko: 친절한 얘길 건네면 얼마든지 물어도 돼

translation.en: [man] Good to see you. How's work?
[Donna] Wait, wait, wait! Hold the bus!
Wait! Wait! Sam! Hold the bus!
They've still got you on the night shift, huh?
Oh, by the way, Cindy-Lou forgot her hockey stick.
translation.ko: 참, 신디 루가 하키 스틱을 놓고 내렸어요

translation.en: It's really such an awful day. -Hey! Merry Christmas. -[gasps]
translation.ko: - 진짜 끔찍한 날이군 - 안녕, 메리 크리스마스
- 즐거운 성탄절, 수 - 좋은 아침, 프레드

translation.en: Excuse me? Are you getting that?
I need it for my Christmas stuffing. [gasps]
Ugh. No, I can't today. I have a list of errands a mile long
translation.ko: 오늘은 안 돼 할 일도 산더미인데

translation.en: and the babysitter left the sink backed up.
No, I'm not complaining. I'm venting. There's a difference.
translation.ko: 짜증 내는 게 아니라 그냥 하소연하는 거야

translation.en: Okay. Talk to you later. I have to get breakfast on the table.
translation.ko: 나중에 얘기해 아침 식사 차려야 해

translation.en: Right after I unclog this drain again!
translation.ko: 일단 꽉 막힌 이 싱크대부터 뚫고!

translation.en: Buster, we've talked about this. Your brother's head is not breakfast.
translation.ko: 버스터, 몇 번 말해? 동생 머리는 먹는 거 아냐

translation.en: What'd you put down here, anyway? A roller skate?
No. Just batter. Me and Ms. Wilbur made cookies.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 반죽요 윌버 양과 쿠키 구웠어요

translation.en: Oh, that explains it. Come have some eggs.
I can't, I gotta go mail something.
But I made the beds and put away the twins' toys.
translation.ko: 그래도 침대 정리하고 장난감 다 치웠어요

translation.en: Thanks, sweetheart. You didn't have to do that.
Bean, don't feed your brother with your feet.
translation.ko: 빈, 형 입에 발 넣지 마

translation.en: Wait, where are you going again?
I told you, to mail a letter.
Okay, but just come here first.
Thanks, Mom. Bye, Buster. Bye, Bean.
Don't do anything I wouldn't do!
And here goes Cindy-Lou Who, as she dashes through the snow
Oh, no! I'm gonna miss the mailman!
Argh! What is wrong with you? Didn't you see me?
I mean, if that was a sled, well, I'd be dead.
I'm sorry for bumping into you, but this is really important.
translation.ko: 부딪친 건 죄송한데 너무 중요한 거라서요

translation.en: And that right there, Max, is the true nature of the Who child.
translation.ko: 봤지? 이 동네 애들 다 이래
그저 '나, 나 내 편지, 나, 나'

translation.en: -My letter. Me, me, me." -No! You don't understand.
translation.ko: 그저 '나, 나 내 편지, 나, 나' 그런 게 아니에요

translation.en: This isn't just a letter, this is the letter.
translation.ko: 이건 그냥 편지가 아니고 중요한 편지라고요

translation.en: rabidly searching for a "really important" lost letter.
Might it be your list of demands to Santa?
They're not demands. It's more like a wish.
And what I'm wishing for is really, really important.
Well, then, why send a letter? I mean, if it's really that important, you should just ask him face-to-face.
translation.ko: 그렇게 중요한 소원이면 직접 만나서 부탁해야지

translation.en: Oh, but that's right. No one's ever seen him.
translation.ko: 하긴 못 만나겠네 아무도 산타를 못 봤잖아
하긴 못 만나겠네 아무도 산타를 못 봤잖아 내가 실수했네

translation.en: Come on, Max, let's get out of here.
[Bricklebaum singing] ♪ Have a holly, jolly Christmas ♪
♪ It's the best time of the year ♪
translation.ko: 일 년 중 가장 기쁜 때

translation.en: Quick, let's make a run for it.
♪ I don't know if there'll be snow ♪
♪ But have a cup of cheer ♪
♪ Say hello to friends you know ♪
Oh, my goodness, Mr. Grinch! I'm coming.
That's one tough balloon that you're fighting there,
you old feisty frosty. Here, come on. Let me help you up.
I do not want, or need, your help.
Oh. How did that get in there?
Hey, I'm sorry if I made you uncomfy.
We all gotta keep the gray away. [laughs]
-I myself use Chocolate Explosion. -You know what?
translation.ko: 난 '초콜릿 팡팡'을 애용하죠 이봐, 사과하려면 저걸로 사과해야지

translation.en: If you want to apologize for something, apologize for that!
Don't blame me. Haven't you heard?
The mayor wants Christmas to be three times bigger this year.
That means three times the lights, three times the eggnog, three times the...
translation.ko: 그러니까 조명도 3배 크리스마스 음료도 3배 그리고 또...

translation.en: Oh, I get it. This is one of your kidding things.
Finally, something you said is actually funny. [laughing]
[laughs] Yeah, I do kid a lot,
-but, no, this is actually-- -Christmas three times bigger!
Well, you're just gonna have a good time with this, aren't you?
I gotta say, it's really nice to see you laughing.
Oh, you're a scream! Have a nice life. Goodbye.
Whoo! Oh, man. Mr. Grinch. Oh.
[narrator] From the edge of his ledge way up in the sky
the Grinch felt upset, though he wasn't sure why.
translation.ko: 그린치는 이유를 알 수 없는 슬픔을 느꼈어요

translation.en: It could've been Christmas, all that joy and the such
or some thoughts from his past that he just couldn't quite touch.
translation.ko: 차마 꺼내고 싶지 않은 어린 시절의 기억 때문인지

translation.en: But whatever it was, it made his heart moan.
Though he was used to it now, this being alone.
And now safe in his cave, and apart from the fray,
translation.ko: 누구도 괴롭히지 않는 자신의 안전한 동굴 속에서

translation.en: That's right, yeah. Just right there.
Four jackets? Aren't you a little hot?
Oh, wow! Any, uh, particular reason?
Well, it must be if you need to go see him in person.
-It sure is. -Okay, then. Well, good luck
and I guess I'll see you in about a month.
translation.ko: 그럼 우린 한 달 뒤에나 보겠네?

translation.en: It takes a whole month to get to the North Pole?
translation.ko: 북극 가는 데 한 달이나 걸려요?

translation.en: Christmas will be over by the time I got there.
Now, we would miss you at Christmas.
Wow, I guess I'm gonna have to come up with another plan.
Hey, maybe while you're thinking, you could put the halo on the angel.
translation.ko: 계획 짤 동안 천사 머리에 후광 좀 달아줘

translation.en: You wanna take your jackets off?
Yeah, at least one or two of them.
[Donna] No, boys. Don't pull the angel's wings off. She needs those.
translation.ko: 쌍둥이들 천사 날개 뜯으면 안 돼

translation.en: What do you wanna do today?
All right, all right. I'm sorry.
What would you like to do?
More than embarrassing to be beaten by a dog.
What in the world is happening?
It's the most beautiful Christmas tree you've ever seen. [laughs]
Oh, you just wait till we light it tonight.
you'll be celebrating Christmas with the rest of us. Ho-ho!
translation.ko: 당신도 크리스마스 분위기에 흠뻑 빠질 거예요
또 봐요, 그린치 아니, 당신 또 볼 일 없어

translation.en: You will not see me later, and I will not be celebrating.
translation.ko: 아니, 당신 또 볼 일 없어 난 크리스마스 즐길 생각 없고!

translation.en: [Mayor McGerkle] Oh, how marvelous this time of year is.
Welcome, Who-ville, to the annual tree-lighting ceremony.
translation.ko: 후빌 트리 점등식에 오신 여러분 환영합니다

translation.en: Look what I made, everybody. It's a Christmas dragon.
It came to me in a dream.
Find a good spot for it.
[Mayor McGerkle] Now, let's get ready to flip that switch and light up the sky.
translation.ko: 이제 스위치를 켜서 밤하늘을 환히 밝힙시다

translation.en: [chuckles] Oh, no! Not on my watch, you don't.
translation.ko: 그건 안 되지 내가 눈 시퍼렇게 뜨고 보고 있는데!

translation.en: See you guys soon! I'm gonna go find Groopert.
Okay. Have fun. Bye. Say bye.
Here you go. I hope your big brother gets what he deserves.
translation.ko: 자, 여기 "눈 뭉치" 네 형한테 당한 만큼 갚아

translation.en: Good. What I can't sell I can always eat.
translation.ko: 응, 안 팔리는 건 "눈 셔벗" 내가 먹으면 돼

translation.en: I need to talk to you about something really important.
All right, check this out, Groopert.
I'm gonna stay up on Christmas Eve this year and meet Santa Claus.
translation.ko: 나 올해는 안 자고 있다가 산타를 만날 거야

translation.en: Yeah, I really gotta talk to him.
But I'm going to tell you because you're my best friend.
She works all night and takes care of us all day.
translation.ko: 엄만 밤새워 일하고 낮엔 종일 우릴 돌보셔

translation.en: but I know it's really hard for her.
So I figured if anyone could fix that, it'd be Santa.
And I just asked him for a turtle.
Okay, Who-ville, it is time to light this beautiful tree.
translation.ko: 이제 이 아름다운 트리에 불을 밝히겠습니다

translation.en: All right, just attach this here
and we'll be ready to launch. [grunts]
I know! I wish I could see the look on their faces.
translation.ko: 알아, 나도 저 인간들 표정이 궁금하다

translation.en: That could be so much worse.
There it is, the most beautiful tree Who-ville has ever seen.
translation.ko: 보십시오 후빌 마을 역사상 가장 아름다운 트리입니다

translation.en: [narrator] He walked through the crowd and the sound, and the lights.
translation.ko: 시끌벅적한 소음과 눈부신 불빛 속을 걸을 때

translation.en: And his ears heard the thump of their joy and delights.
And it took him right back to his earliest years,
translation.ko: 그 순간 어린 시절의 자기 모습이 떠올랐죠

translation.en: to that lost, lonely boy who cried all of those tears.
translation.ko: 마음 둘 곳 없어 울기만 했던 외로운 아이

translation.en: That lost, lonely boy, isolated and sad
with no home of his own, no mom and no dad.
translation.ko: 집도, 엄마 아빠도 없이 혼자였던 아이 "보육원"

translation.en: And as the Grinch looked around, he felt downright scared
as he remembered that Christmas where nobody cared.
Where nobody showed, not even a flea,
translation.ko: 그의 곁엔 사람은커녕 개미 한 마리 없었어요

translation.en: and there were no cards, no gifts, and no tree.
And as he watched other kids,
that this was the single worst day of the year.
And now here it was, that day once again
when he felt all those feelings he felt way back when.
translation.ko: 어릴 때의 기분이 다시 그를 엄습했어요

translation.en: When he'd watch Whos young and old all sit down to feast,
and they'd feast, and they'd feast,
and they'd feast, feast, feast, feast.
They'd feast on Who-pudding, and rare Who roast beast.
translation.ko: 그들은 후 푸딩과 후 로스트 고기를 마음껏 먹었어요

translation.en: Which is something the Grinch could not stand in the least.
translation.ko: 그린치가 너무나 싫어하는 그 음식들을 말이죠

translation.en: And then they'd do something he liked least of all.
translation.ko: 그리곤 그가 가장 싫어하는 짓을 했어요

translation.en: Every Who down in Who-ville, the tall and the small,
would stand close together with Christmas bells ringing.
translation.ko: 크리스마스 벨이 울리면 다 함께 모여

translation.en: They'd stand hand-in-hand and the Whos would start singing.
translation.ko: 손에 손을 잡고 노래를 부르기 시작했죠

translation.en: and they'll sing, sing, sing, sing.
[narrator] Yes, he couldn't recall without feeling the sting.
[whispers] I must stop this whole thing.
For 53 years I've put up with it.
I must stop this Christmas from coming,
translation.ko: 크리스마스가 오는 걸 내 손으로 막아야 해

translation.en: The Grinch got a wonderful, awful idea.
translation.ko: 멋지고도 몹쓸 아이디어가 그에게 떠오른 거예요

translation.en: I know just what to do.
I'm going to steal their Christmas.
When they wake and see it's gone
translation.ko: 아침에 그 모든 게 사라진 걸 알면

translation.en: then all their joy and happiness will be gone as well.
Genius starts with the abs, Max.
the question we have all been waiting for.
Well, prepare to have your little doggy mind blown. Poof.
translation.ko: 듣고 놀라서 기절하지 마 이 겁쟁이야

translation.en: But instead of giving all the joy and happiness,
If he can deliver Christmas to the whole world in one night,
then I can certainly steal it from little old Who-ville.
translation.ko: 한 마을의 크리스마스를 훔치는 거야 간단하지

translation.en: what's Santa have that I don't?
Um, what are you doing with my bowling ball?
translation.ko: 내 볼링공 갖고 뭐 하는 거야?

translation.en: -And you're taking it where? -It's a secret.
[sighs] All right, but not without breakfast. Catch.

translation.ko: - 안녕, 신디 루! - 안녕하세요, 커빈스 씨

translation.en: Let's go, let's go. Let's move.
But I meant about meeting Santa.
We know no one's ever done it.
I'm gonna sit in the living room with my eyes wide open, like this,
translation.ko: 내가 거실에 눈을 크게 뜨고 앉아있는 거야

translation.en: and if I start to drift off,
Um, I'm pretty sure you're gonna fall asleep.
And by the time you wake up...
We pour it on the roof, the reindeer get stuck
and then they can't fly away.
Also, how do we get all that syrup on the roof?
translation.ko: 게다가 그 많은 시럽을 어떻게 갖고 올라가?

translation.en: Wait a minute. I think I got it.
We're gonna need the whole gang for this one.
Okay. If I'm gonna become Santa, then I need to get into character.
translation.ko: "크리스마스 도감" 산타가 되려면 그의 특성부터 파악해야지

translation.en: How does pudding work its way into everything?
Look at this, little girls and boys giggling over sugarplums.
translation.ko: 이것 봐, 어린애들이 눈깔사탕을 보며 낄낄대고 있어

translation.en: Look how they did the roof of the gingerbread house with vanilla icing.
translation.ko: "생강 쿠키 집" 생강 쿠키 집 지붕에 바닐라 설탕 옷을 입혔네
이 집엔 젤리 가족이 사나 봐

translation.en: Huh. So dumb. So, so stupidly dumb.
Oh, well. Let's just start by finding ourselves some reindeer.
This, my little friend, is the Rein-Horn.
It perfectly recreates the mating call of the reindeer.
translation.ko: 순록이 구애하는 소릴 똑같이 낼 수 있지

translation.en: Oh. Hey, there. Sorry, little goat. I was calling for a--
translation.ko: 안녕 미안하다, 염소야 내가 부른 건...

translation.en: Now, reindeer migrate, so maybe we'll catch a few headed south for the winter.
translation.ko: 겨울을 보내러 남쪽으로 가는 순록을 찾아보자

translation.en: I also read that they tend to mate in densely wooded--
Shoo! Away! Go back to the goat farm!
All right, now that that's over, -back to the task at hand. -[wind whooshing]
[gasps] We'll have 100 reindeer to pull our--
He looks like he ate the other seven.

translation.ko: 우린 지금 운명을 향해 가는 거야

translation.en: All right, you called, we came.
Thanks for getting here so fast, guys.
Yeah, I don't have very long. My parents set the timer.
translation.ko: 난 곧 가야 해 엄마가 타이머 켜놨어

translation.en: we're going to do something that's never been done before.
translation.ko: 우린 그 누구도 한 적 없는 일을 하게 될 거야

translation.en: Why would we wanna do that?
Duh. To steal all his toys. I love it.
-That's a great idea. -Not to steal his toys.
translation.ko: - 좋은 생각인데? - 장난감 훔치려는 게 아냐

translation.en: To, um... To talk to him.
What? Why'd you wanna talk to him?
Well, I don't wanna do it if you won't tell me why.

translation.ko: 우리끼리 이러기야? 액슬, 네가 16달러랑 엄마 여행 가방 빌려 달라 했을 때

translation.en: Axl, when you asked to borrow $16 and my mom's suitcase,
translation.ko: 액슬, 네가 16달러랑 엄마 여행 가방 빌려 달라 했을 때

translation.en: And what about you, Ozzy? Remember when you got stuck in that--
translation.ko: 오지, 넌? 네가 전에 사고 쳤...

translation.en: All right, all right, okay. Jeez.
I did it because you're my friend.
And when something matters to you, that means it matters to me.
Okay, okay, okay. You convinced me.
-Count me in, too. -All right, we're in.
-[Axl] Yeah, let's do this! -[Ozzy] Let's make it happen. Awesome.
-[Donna] Cindy-Lou, dinner time! -[man] Come here, guys, dinner time!
All right, we meet first thing in the morning.
-Okay. -All right. -See you tomorrow. -See you guys in the morning.

translation.ko: 오지, 타이머 다 됐어! 알았어요, 엄마

translation.en: [whispering] This is the loudest snow I've ever heard in my life.
translation.ko: 무슨 눈 밟는 소리가 그렇게 요란해?

translation.en: You two, go around the back.
Wait for me to drop the sleigh from the roof. Okay?
translation.ko: 내가 지붕에서 썰매를 던질 때까지 기다려, 알았지?

translation.en: Hey! Who taught Mabel how to use the doorbell?
translation.ko: 우리 메이블이 벨도 누를 줄 아네?

translation.en: All right, here it comes. Get ready.
Oh, look at that. Mabel is delivering cakes now.
I mean, is this the best Christmas or what?
Man, I don't know what's in this cake,
but I think I just saw Santa Claus. [laughs]
translation.ko: 나 방금 산타를 본 거 같아

translation.en: We did mean things and we did them in style.
translation.ko: 나쁜 짓을 잘 해냈잖아 그것도 아주 멋지게!

translation.en: You sleep in your bed, and I sleep in...
translation.ko: 넌 네 침대에서 자고 난 내 침대에서...

translation.en: Oh, no, no, not you, too. I don't believe this. Max, did you teach him puppy eyes?
translation.ko: 얜 또 왜 이래? 네가 강아지 눈빛 가르쳐줬냐?

translation.en: Mmm. Now that is a great cup of coffee!
Max, this morning, you and I need to do some recon.
translation.ko: 맥스, 오늘 아침엔 나랑 정찰 나가자

translation.en: Fred, you just sit right there.
Intel, Max, that's what we're after.
How many houses are in Who-ville and how many Whos?
translation.ko: 후빌에 집이 몇 채고 주민은 몇 명인지

translation.en: How many wreaths and trees and chimney flues?
I'll be in your ear the whole time, and whatever you're seeing
[through comms] I'll be seeing on the monitor.
Now, let's go in for a look.
Six houses on Oak Street... Oh, watch out!
Now cut through Main Street and survey the south side.
Look at those greedy little gift monsters.
Loading themselves up with Christmas junk.
So I woke up this morning, got dressed, had my coffee,
translation.ko: 아침에 옷 입고 커피 마신 뒤에

translation.en: went outside, looked on the roof.
My, my, I wonder who took it.
If we do 28 houses an hour for six hours, that would be sausages.
Max! Don't even think about it.
Come on, we got work to do.
and then this house, skip the subdivision for the moment,
knock off the entire southeast quadrant of the town.
And then we finish it all up on Whistling Who Lane.
and only seven hours of darkness to work with.
translation.ko: 해가 진 뒤 7시간 만에 끝내야 해

translation.en: That means we have to be fast and focused.
And believe you me, there will be temptation...
You will want to unwrap it and play with it.
translation.ko: 이걸 보면 뜯어서 갖고 놀고 싶겠지

translation.en: And if you can get past the present, the only obstacle left is
translation.ko: 선물의 유혹을 이겨내면 단 하나의 장애물이 남지

translation.en: Look at it in all its red, sugary splendor.
translation.ko: 맛있겠지? 화려한 빨간색에 달콤한 설탕 옷

translation.en: No, no, no! Look at yourselves!
[in monotone] Ho, ho, ho, ho. Look at this pretty house.
translation.ko: 호, 호, 호 집이 정말 예쁘구나

translation.en: I will leave presents for the people.
Come on, it's not the school play, dude.
Then why do I have to wear the outfit?
Groopert, focus! Just get the cookie.
But I can see the string.
Stop worrying! It'll be dark at night.
What if he has a flashlight?
Have you ever seen a picture of Santa with a flashlight?
translation.ko: 플래시 들고 있는 산타 그림 봤어?

translation.en: Hmm. What do we have here? A delicious little cookie.
Do I still get to eat the cookie?
So, I tinkered with our sleigh a bit.
Now you'll be riding in style.
translation.ko: 이거 타고 다니면 폼 좀 나겠지?

translation.en: A throne for a barking prince. How do you like that?
translation.ko: 멍멍이 왕자의 럭셔리 의자! 마음에 드냐?

translation.en: you are the engine of this great machine. Understood?
translation.ko: 넌 이 멋진 썰매의 엔진이야 알았어?

translation.en: Now, remember, this is just a practice run.
But on this team, we practice like we play.
So, let's leave it all out on the snow.
Now, let's pick up the pace and see how she handles.
translation.ko: 속도를 더 높여보자 그래도 이상 없는지

translation.en: We're doing it, Max. We are doing it!
Sorry, but we don't need any more reindeer.
translation.ko: 미안한데 우린 순록 더 필요 없어

translation.en: [narrator] It was the day before Christmas and the Whos were abuzz,
all doing the things that a Christmas Who does.
Some were out buying presents, others just milled about.
translation.ko: 선물을 사는 사람들 신나서 돌아다니는 사람들

translation.en: But the whole town felt joyous
-of that, there was no doubt. -[camera shutters clicking]
The weather was perfect, and soon snow would fall.
translation.ko: 곧 눈이 쏟아질 듯 날씨마저 완벽했죠

translation.en: I've been making lots of cool...
It's gonna be a big night.
We got all the gizmos and gazmos we need,
but we still don't have the proper outfit.
Come on, let's do a little stitching.
There's only one thing left to do.
do you know what you are?
You are a sturdy little fella.
In fact, I think you're the best dog
you will guide my sleigh tonight.
translation.ko: 네가 오늘 밤에 내 썰매를 끌어주렴

translation.en: I knew you wouldn't let me down.
translation.ko: 역시 넌 날 실망 안 시켜

translation.en: [narrator] It was now Christmas Eve. There was joy in the air.
translation.ko: 그날은 온 세상에 기쁨이 가득한 크리스마스이브였어요

translation.en: For in just a few hours, Santa Claus would be there.
translation.ko: 이제 몇 시간 뒤면 산타클로스가 찾아와서

translation.en: And the gifts would be left, and the stockings all filled.
translation.ko: 양말 속에 갖가지 선물을 두고 가겠죠

translation.en: And the anticipation, well, it started to build.
translation.ko: 모두의 마음은 기대와 설렘으로 부풀어 갔어요
몸을 피곤하게 해야 잠이 잘 오죠

translation.en: All right, eight hours till Christmas morning.
Waffle One, this is Waffle Two. Are you there? Over.
[Cindy-Lou] I read you loud and clear, Waffle Two.
[Groopert] This is Groopert, by the way.
[Groopert] Oh. I just wanted to wish you good luck with Santa Claus.
translation.ko: 산타클로스 만나는 거 꼭 성공하길 빌게

translation.en: So, you got any last-minute wishes for Santa?
Yep. I have one great big wish.
translation.ko: 네, 아주 근사한 소원을 빌 거예요

translation.en: Because you deserve everything you want and more.
translation.ko: 넌 원하는 모든 걸 가질 자격이 있으니까

translation.en: I want the same thing for you.
How did I end up with such a wonderful daughter?
translation.ko: 내가 어떻게 이런 멋진 딸을 낳았지?

translation.en: I don't know. Sometimes you just get lucky.
[narrator] The Grinch was now ready to start his big trip.
He stood like a captain aboard a great ship.
Yes, the time had now come to take off like a shot.
translation.ko: 시간은 흘러 드디어 운명의 순간이 됐어요

translation.en: Here we go, Max. Let's see what you've got!
[narrator] And down the Grinch came on his great fateful ride
translation.ko: 그린치는 운명을 건 최후의 결전을 앞두고

translation.en: toward the good homes of Who-ville and the Christmas inside.
translation.ko: "메리 크리스마스" 후빌의 크리스마스를 향해 거침없이 달려갔어요

translation.en: He had planned it and prepped it, big detail to small.
Yes, he'd get rid of Christmas now, once and for all.
translation.ko: 네, 그는 크리스마스를 영원히 없애버릴 작정이었죠

translation.en: You take the outside, I'll take the inside.
translation.ko: 넌 밖을 맡아 난 안을 맡을게

translation.en: [narrator] He was ready to pounce, and set the score right.
translation.ko: 그는 복수할 준비가 단단히 돼 있었어요

translation.en: He'd make up for the past, and he'd do it tonight.
translation.ko: 과거의 원한을 오늘 밤에 다 갚기로 다짐했죠

translation.en: [narrator] He swept up their presents with the speed of a wiz.
And he knew he'd cause sadness, only theirs now, not his.
translation.ko: 이제 슬픔은 그가 아닌 마을 사람들의 것이 되겠죠

translation.en: All this excess and nonsense it was all about greed.
translation.ko: 이 모든 허영과 낭비는 탐욕에서 나온

translation.en: The Grinch went to work. He scooped up the toys.
He hit a few snags as he made his way through...

translation.ko: 물론 중간에 방해꾼도 좀 있었죠 화난 오렌지색 고양이와

translation.en: [narrator] He stole pop guns and bicycles, roller skates, drums,
translation.ko: 그는 장난감 총, 자전거 롤러스케이트, 드럼

translation.en: checker boards, tricycles, popcorn and plums.
Gadgets and gizmos and dolls with strange names,
goofballs and shloof-balls and video games.
translation.ko: 갖가지 공 종류와 비디오 게임들을 훔쳤죠

translation.en: And he swiped, and he poached. Yes, the stealing was on.
translation.ko: 그는 훔치고 또 훔쳤어요 모든 걸 쓸어 담았죠

translation.en: And this day that he hated, well, he made it be gone.
translation.ko: 그토록 싫었던 그 날이 이제 사라져가고 있었어요

translation.en: This is it. The last house.
[singing] ♪ Dashing through the snow In a one-dog open sleigh ♪
translation.ko: 흰 눈 사이로 개 썰매 타고

translation.en: ♪ One more house to go And Christmas goes away ♪
How do I get out of this?
Oh. Hello. A little help, please.
I'll let you down, just give me a minute.
Just trying to remember which cord it is.
translation.ko: 이 중에 어떤 줄을 푸는 거더라?

translation.en: I'm so sorry, are you okay?
Wow. I can't believe it's really you!
I'm so sorry about the trap and everything, but I really need...
translation.ko: 덫을 놓은 건 죄송한데 제가 꼭 부탁...

translation.en: Hey! Why are you taking our Christmas tree?
One of the lights wasn't working,
so I thought I'd take it back to the workshop and see if I could fix it.
I didn't know you did that.
Now, why don't you go back upstairs to bed, and then when you wake up the tree will be fixed
translation.ko: 그만 가서 자 아침엔 내가 고친 트리 밑에

translation.en: and your presents will be waiting under it.
Wait. You don't understand, I don't want presents.
[chuckles] Of course you do. Everyone wants presents.
translation.ko: 선물을 원하지 않는 사람이 어디 있어?

translation.en: I want you to help my mom.
and is always doing stuff for other people,
and I just want her to be happy.
You want me to help your mom?
And everyone should be happy, right?
translation.ko: 누구나 다 행복해야 하잖아요 안 그래요?

translation.en: Now, why don't you go back up to bed, hmm?
I wish you could celebrate with us tomorrow.
We all get together and sing.
that if you close your eyes and listen,
translation.ko: 눈을 감고 그 노랠 듣고 있으면

translation.en: all of your sadness just goes away.
I just met the strangest little Who girl.
translation.ko: 방금 너무 이상한 후 여자아이를 만났어

translation.en: [narrator] He tried to forget it, but the words filled his head
and he found himself thinking about what the young girl had said.
It was hard to imagine. Could it really be true?
But if they could all be happy, maybe he could be, too.
translation.ko: 모두가 행복할 수 있다면 그도 행복할 수 있지 않을까요?

translation.en: [narrator] Her head felt unsteady, and her heart was just sick.
translation.ko: 신디 루는 너무 놀라 심장이 멎는 듯했어요

translation.en: It must be a joke or a prank, or a trick.
translation.ko: 누가 심술이 나서 못된 장난을 친 거 같았죠

translation.en: Who would do such a thing?
Who would stoop down this low?
And then one little girl realized she might just know.
translation.ko: 소녀는 그게 누군지 문득 알 거 같았어요

translation.en: 3,000 feet up, up the side of Mount Crumpit,
the Grinch rode with his load to the tip-top to dump it.
translation.ko: 썰매를 밀고 올라갔어요 훔쳐온 걸 버리기 위해서...

translation.en: because I wanted to ask him to do something special for you.
translation.ko: 엄마를 위해 뭔가 해달라는 부탁을 하려고요

translation.en: But I think I made him mad
translation.ko: 근데 그것 때문에 화가 났나 봐요

translation.en: and that's why he stole everyone's Christmas.
No! No, no. No, honey, this isn't your fault.
And besides, I already have the greatest gift I could ever get.
translation.ko: 그리고 엄만 이미 최고의 선물을 받았는걸

translation.en: What's that? Do you hear it?
Don't they know what I've done?
[narrator] As he watched the small girl, he thought he might melt.
translation.ko: 소녀를 보며 그의 마음은 서서히 녹아내렸어요

translation.en: If he did what she did, would he feel what she felt?
translation.ko: 소녀가 하는 대로 하면 그도 저 행복을 느낄 수 있을까요?

translation.en: And the luscious sound swelled, reaching up to the skies.
translation.ko: 그 아름다운 노래는 하늘 높이 퍼져 올라갔어요

translation.en: And the Grinch heard with his heart, and it tripled in size.
translation.ko: 노랠 듣던 그린치의 심장은 순식간에 3배로 커졌죠

translation.en: No, don't worry. I got it.
-Max, the gifts! We have to return them. -[barks]
translation.ko: 맥스, 저 선물 다 돌려줘야 해

translation.en: [narrator] And having heard the Whos' goodness, having felt the Whos' song,
he tried to make right what he had made wrong.
Because I thought it would fix something that happened a long time ago.
translation.ko: 오래전에 겪었던 아픔이 사라질 줄 알았거든요

translation.en: [stammers] I kind of thought you might like it.
You don't like it? Oh, I could take it back.
It's not a big deal. -I just thought maybe you... -[barking]
Merry Christmas to you, too, Max.
Yes. Yes, I do. I remember you.
My name is Cindy-Lou. Cindy-Lou Who.
translation.ko: 전 신디 루예요 신디 루 후

translation.en: It's nice to meet you, Cindy-Lou.
[chuckles] Whoa! Nice to meet you, Max.
I just came to invite you to our house for Christmas dinner.
Because you've been alone long enough.
And make sure you bring your sweet doggy, too!
Um, this is a bad idea.
[stammers] I can't do this. I can't do this.
I'm so happy you decided to come.
Welcome! Thank you for inviting me.
And it's a very nice tie.
Come on in, I'll show you around.
Aunt Ida, I'd like you to meet my friend, the Grinch.
translation.ko: 아이다 숙모 제 친구인 그린치 씨예요

translation.en: Oh, it's nice to meet you, Mr. Grinch.
Thank you. It's nice to be here.
Oh, here, let me take that for you.
Cindy-Lou, could you make a little room for this, please?
translation.ko: 신디 루 이거 놓을 자리 좀...

translation.en: No, don't worry. I've got it.
Is that grouchy, grumpy Grinchy I see standing over there?
-Come on, Grinchy, give me a hug. -Oh! [chuckles]
It don't count if you don't hug back, buddy.
Okay, come take your seats, everyone. Dinner's ready.
Come on, you're sitting next to me.
This is my first Christmas dinner. What happens?
translation.ko: 난 이런 자리 처음이야 이제 뭐 하면 돼?

translation.en: Would you do the honors, Mr. Grinch?
Do you mind if I say something first?
Um, well, everybody, I just want to say,
hating Christmas and everything about it.
But now I see that it wasn't Christmas I hated,
translation.ko: 하지만 제가 싫어했던 건 크리스마스가 아니라

translation.en: And I have all of you to thank for it.
your daughter's kindness changed my life.
[narrator] And the Grinch raised his glass, and led the Whos in a toast.
translation.ko: 그린치는 잔을 높이 들고 이렇게 외쳤어요

translation.en: To kindness and love, the things we need most.
translation.ko: 친절과 사랑이 넘치는 세상을 위해 건배!
